Articles.Content:
I have my first mining contract. It says I have to "extract" a certain amount of ore. Does this mean I just have to dig it up and store it in the lander? Or do I have to bring it back to Kerbin?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-26T17:28:46Z" title="06/26/2015 05:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 26, 2015</time> by davidpsummers**
If it doesn't say you have to take it somewhere, then you just have to dig it up. But you will have to dig up a new set of ore for each new contract.
Thanks. Now I know how much fuel I need!
